long_description: Use these medium Scupper Stoppers to keep excess water out of the cockpit of your Ocean Kayak watercraft. Designed to plug the scupper holes that are part of the unique design of all Ocean Kayak watercraft, giving you a drier ride. Tapered design is easy to insert; cord loop allows easy removal. Updated design enhances durability and maintains shape to create a tighter fit.
short_description: Use these medium Scupper Stoppers to keep excess water out of the cockpit of your Ocean Kayak watercraft.
